name: Potted
description:
As you step into the greenhouse that has been passed down to you by your late relative, you can´t help but feel a mix of excitement and trepidation. It is not in the best shape, but the green thumb in your roots tells you that this greenhouse can be brought back to ist former glory. 

Order different plants, take care of them and sell them to customers or take cuttings to multiply your crops in order to expand your inventory of beautiful greenery. 

This game was developed in 48h as an entry for the Global Game Jam 2023.
